normal.intro: hey üëã! i'm ryan, a third year cs student and ta @ ubc, and a software engineer intern at planview working on

items.description: i love the cross section of engineering, sport, and speed. unfortunately, i support ferarri.
i follow the premier league, and european football in general. i support liverpool (rip jota ‚ù§Ô∏è). i also follow international competitions.
i hope to own and maintain a clean nb or nc miata in the near future. into cars in general though.
vegas pro user since 2018. made montages, school projects, funny short-form videos, and more.
i primarily use a realforce r3s with topre switches which i purchased from japan. i have a few other custom boards with more traditional cherry style switches, both soldered and hot-swappable.
currently enjoying valorant, peak with friends, gta v while waiting for gta vi. previously played overwatch, fortnite, minecraft, fifa, f1.
